concept.title: What is Incanter?
concept.shortdesc: Incanter is a Clojure-based, R-like platform for statistical computing and graphics.

conbody.p: Incanter is a Clojure-based, R-like statistical computing and graphics environment for the JVM. At the core of Incanter are the Parallel Colt numerics library (a multithreaded version of Colt), and the JFreeChart charting library, as well as several other Java and Clojure libraries.
